text.autoconfig.rrls.title: Remove Reloading Screen
text.autoconfig.rrls.option.miniRender: Render a mini (aka hidden) version of the overlay
text.autoconfig.rrls.option.type: What will be displayed on reloading
text.autoconfig.rrls.option.reloadText: The text that will be displayed if TEXT is selected above
text.autoconfig.rrls.option.reInitScreen: Reinitializing the current screen after a reload
Disabling this feature may eliminate the hang-up after the reload is complete
text.autoconfig.rrls.option.removeOverla: Hide the overlay after the end
text.autoconfig.rrls.option.earlyPackSta: Early sending of status about server resourcepack
Some servers specifically wait for the player to load resources, because of this the game may be displayed incorrectly
Example: You were underground while reloading resources
text.autoconfig.rrls.option.forceClose: Hide the overlay, even if there is nothing behind it
text.autoconfig.rrls.option.forceClose.@: Actually now there is, I've been planning a workaround for a long time, but now there is one in minecraft :)
text.autoconfig.rrls.option.skipForgeOve: Replaces the (Neo)Forge loading overlay with vanilla
